pr_title: SB Track2 SyncReceiverClient: add maxWaitTime in receive()

timeline.bodyText: This was discussed during review that instead of using tryTimeout, we should be using some default value 1 minute or less.
timeline.author: hemanttanwar

replies.bodyText: The default AmqpRetryOptions has the timeout already set. This isn't necessary. Or if they pass their own default tryTimeout.
replies.author: conniey

timeline.bodyText: To save duplicated logic, this method should call the maximal overload.
timeline.author: conniey

timeline.bodyText: Possible NullPointerException if maxWaitTime is null
timeline.author: conniey
